full_summary:
===============

**Contract Opportunity Title (English and French)**
----------------------------------------------------

*   English: 5P421-220036-B Large Animal Incinerator
*   French: 5P421-220036-B Incinérateur pour grand animaux

**Contract ID and Status**
---------------------------

*   Contract ID: WS3866916337
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Solicitation Number: WS3866916337
*   Tender Closing Date: September 26, 2023, 14:00:00
*   Tender Status: **Publicly Available** (Expired)

**Description**
--------------

The Parks Canada Agency (PC) invites tenders for the supply, delivery, and installation of one (1) large animal incinerator to Banff National Park.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   **Expected Contract Dates:**
    *   Expected Contract Start Date: September 28, 2023
    *   Expected Contract End Date: September 28, 2024
*   **Regions of Delivery:**
    *   Banff, Alberta, Canada
*   **Trade Agreements:**
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   ** Procurement Method:**
    *   Competitive - Open Bidding

**Submitting Tenders**
-------------------

*   Tender submissions must be submitted electronically via Ariba Discovery at the provided notice URL (French: Liens de l'avis).
    *   Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17285498?extsite=MTcyODU0OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery
